control_mp_cost&bd2[000].description: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, decreases own morale consumption by<@cc.vdown>+0.5</>; and when self morale is above<@cc.kw>12</>, <$cc.bd_a1><@cc.rem>Perception Information</></><@cc.vup>+10</>

control_mp_cost&bd3[000].desc: 进驻控制中枢时，热情值处于<@cc.kw>40</>点及以上时，自身心情每小时消耗<@cc.vdown>+0.05</>
control_mp_cost&bd3[000].description: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, if 热情值 more than <@cc.kw>40</> points, decreases own morale consumption by<@cc.vdown>+0.05</>

control_mp_cost&bd_up[000].desc: 进驻控制中枢时，自身心情每小时消耗<@cc.vdown>+0.5</>；每个<$cc.g.sui><@cc.kw>岁</></>干员进驻在宿舍和活动室以外的设施则<$cc.bd_b1><@cc.rem>人间烟火</></><@cc.vup>+5</>（最多5名）
control_mp_cost&bd_up[000].description: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, self Morale loss per hour <@cc.vdown>+0.5</>; for each <$cc.g.sui><@cc.kw>Sui</></> Operator assigned to buildings other than Dormitories and Activity Rooms, <$cc.bd_b1><@cc.rem>Worldly Plight</></><@cc.vup>+5</> (max 5)

control_mp_bd_cost_expand[000].desc: 进驻控制中枢时，<$cc.c.room2><@cc.kw>其他设施</></>内处于工作状态的干员心情每小时恢复<@cc.vup>+0.05</>；同时每有<@cc.vup>20</>点<$cc.bd_b1><@cc.rem>人间烟火</></>，则额外<@cc.vup>+0.05</>，（与控制中枢加成有<$cc.c.sui2_1><@cc.rem>特殊比较规则</></>）
control_mp_bd_cost_expand[000].description: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, Operators working in <$cc.c.room2><@cc.kw>other buildings</></> recover <@cc.vup>+0.05</> Morale per hour, with an additional <@cc.vup>+0.05</> for every <@cc.vup>20</> <$cc.bd_b1><@cc.rem>Worldly Plight</></> (<$cc.c.sui2_1><@cc.rem>Special Comparison Rules</></> apply with Control Center bonus)

control_mp_expand_double[000].desc: 进驻控制中枢时，<$cc.c.room2><@cc.kw>其他设施</></>内处于工作状态的干员心情每小时恢复<@cc.vup>+0.1</>，当<@cc.kw>魔王</>进驻中枢时额外<@cc.vup>+0.1</>（与控制中枢加成有<$cc.c.sui2_1><@cc.rem>特殊比较规则</></>）
control_mp_expand_double[000].description: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, Operators working in <$cc.c.room2><@cc.kw>other buildings</></> recover <@cc.vup>+0.1</> Morale per hour, with an additional <@cc.vup>+0.1</> when <@cc.kw>Civilight Eterna</> is also assigned to the Control Center (<$cc.c.sui2_1><@cc.rem>Special Comparison Rules</></> apply with Control Center bonus).

control_mp_cost&bd2[010].desc: 进驻控制中枢时，自身心情每小时消耗<@cc.vdown>+0.5</>，<$cc.bd_felyne><@cc.rem>木天蓼</></><@cc.vup>+8</>

control_mp_aegir1[000].desc: 进驻控制中枢时，每有1个<$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>深海猎人</></>干员进驻在宿舍以外的设施，则自身心情每小时消耗<@cc.vdown>+0.5</>；反之则自身心情每小时恢复<@cc.vup>+0.5</>，如果进驻在宿舍内的<$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>深海猎人</></>干员为满心情，则额外<@cc.vup>+0.5</>

When <$cc.t.accmuguard1><@cc.rem>Martial Arts</></> reaches its cap, the next <@cc.kw>Guard</> Operator's skill Specialization training to level <@cc.kw>1</> is completed immediately, and all <$cc.t.accmuguard1><@cc.rem>Martial Arts</></> is removed.
